channel.title: Loading Char File
channel.description:
When i start up my server i can log in just fine.
But i gave the clients to my friends, and when they try to get on it to help me test it out, they get the error "Loading character profile please try again"
It keeps sending that message every time you try to log in.
Any tips?

item.title: Loading Char File
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

MrPurple436648:

So they can’t connect to my server, got any tips on what the problem could be?

Not forwarded.
No ip not set up.
Wrong ip in client (if it is 127.0.0.1 it will only work for you).

Read full topic

item.title: Loading Char File
item.dc:creator: @MrPurple436648 MrPurple436648
item.description:
@MrPurple436648 wrote:

So they can’t connect to my server, got any tips on what the problem could be?
